name.title: Server Name
name.description: A unique name to identify this Proxmox server

username.title: Proxmox username
username.description: Username used to log-in into proxmox dashboard, example: root@pam (not used with API tokens)

password.title: Proxmox password
password.description: Password used to log-in into proxmox dashboard (alternative to API token)

apiToken.title: API Token (Alternative to password)
apiToken.description: Use API token instead of password for authentication (more secure)

port.title: Proxmox port
port.description: Port to connect to Proxmox server (default: 8006)

ssl.title: Authorize self signed SSL cert
ssl.description: Authorize self signed cert if you do not use a valid SSL certificat (mostly you need to check it when you're using proxmox locally)

accessoryType.title: Default Accessory Type
accessoryType.description: How VMs and containers appear in HomeKit (switch, outlet, lightbulb, or fan)

pollingInterval.title: Status Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check VM/container status automatically (10-300 seconds, 0 to disable polling)
